title: North Sumatra Urban Retreat in the Heart of Medan with Restaurant, Bar & Pool
description:
Stay in the vibrant heart of Indonesia's culinary capital at this luxurious hotel, centrally located and within easy reach of Medan's bustling markets, historic landmarks and the city's famed food scene.

Indulge in a gastronomic journey at the hotel's onsite dining venue, offering a range of international and local delicacies. Maintain your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym or take a refreshing dip in the courtyard swimming pool. If you feel like exploring, the Grand Mosque of Medan and Maimun Palace are just a short stroll away.
location_description: Grand Mercure Maha Cipta Medan Angkasa
offer_address: Jalan Sutomo No. 1, Medan, North Sumatra, Indonesia, 20235
